-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/dustin/gpmf#readme</a>
@package gpmf
@version 0.2.0.0


-- | A low-level parser for <a>GPMF</a> telemetry data.
module GoPro.GPMF

-- | Parse GPMF data from a telemetry stream. A successful return value
--   contains a list of FourCC tagged value lists.
--   
--   Note that the input is the telemetry stream itself, not the container
--   that contains it.
parseGPMF :: ByteString -> Either String [(FourCC, [Value])]
data Value
GInt8 :: [Int8] -> Value
GUint8 :: [Word8] -> Value
GString :: String -> Value
GDouble :: Double -> Value
GFloat :: [Float] -> Value
GFourCC :: FourCC -> Value
GUUID :: [Word8] -> Value
GInt64 :: [Int64] -> Value
GUint64 :: [Word64] -> Value
GInt32 :: [Int32] -> Value
GUint32 :: [Word32] -> Value
GQ32 :: [Word32] -> Value
GQ64 :: [Word64] -> Value
GInt16 :: [Int16] -> Value
GUint16 :: [Word16] -> Value
GTimestamp :: UTCTime -> Value
GComplex :: String -> [Value] -> Value
GNested :: (FourCC, [Value]) -> Value
GUnknown :: (Char, Int, Int, [[Word8]]) -> Value
newtype FourCC
FourCC :: (Char, Char, Char, Char) -> FourCC
instance GHC.Generics.Generic GoPro.GPMF.FourCC
instance GHC.Classes.Eq GoPro.GPMF.FourCC
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.GPMF.FourCC
instance GHC.Generics.Generic GoPro.GPMF.Value
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.GPMF.Value
instance Data.String.IsString GoPro.GPMF.FourCC

module GoPro.GPMF.Lenses
_GUnknown :: Prism' Value (Char, Int, Int, [[Word8]])
_GNested :: Prism' Value (FourCC, [Value])
_GComplex :: Prism' Value (String, [Value])
_GTimestamp :: Prism' Value UTCTime
_GUint16 :: Prism' Value [Word16]
_GInt16 :: Prism' Value [Int16]
_GQ64 :: Prism' Value [Word64]
_GQ32 :: Prism' Value [Word32]
_GUint32 :: Prism' Value [Word32]
_GInt32 :: Prism' Value [Int32]
_GUint64 :: Prism' Value [Word64]
_GInt64 :: Prism' Value [Int64]
_GUUID :: Prism' Value [Word8]
_GFourCC :: Prism' Value FourCC
_GFloat :: Prism' Value [Float]
_GDouble :: Prism' Value Double
_GString :: Prism' Value String
_GUint8 :: Prism' Value [Word8]
_GInt8 :: Prism' Value [Int8]


-- | DEVC is one of the GPMF data types that contains the bulk of
--   interesting telemetry data from within GPMF streams. This module
--   doesn't currently provide high level access to *all* DEVC data (some
--   of it remains low level), but it currently has useful representations
--   of things that seemed interesting to the author.
module GoPro.DEVC

-- | Given a FourCC value (specifically, DEVC) and a list of Values,
--   produce a DEVC value.
mkDEVC :: FourCC -> [Value] -> Maybe DEVC
data DEVC
DEVC :: Int -> String -> Map String Telemetry -> DEVC
[_dev_id] :: DEVC -> Int
[_dev_name] :: DEVC -> String
[_dev_telems] :: DEVC -> Map String Telemetry
dev_id :: Lens' DEVC Int
dev_name :: Lens' DEVC String
dev_telems :: Lens' DEVC (Map String Telemetry)
data Accelerometer
Accelerometer :: Float -> [(Float, Float, Float)] -> Accelerometer
[_acc_temp] :: Accelerometer -> Float
[_acc_vals] :: Accelerometer -> [(Float, Float, Float)]
acc_temp :: Lens' Accelerometer Float
acc_vals :: Lens' Accelerometer [(Float, Float, Float)]
data Gyroscope
Gyroscope :: Float -> [(Float, Float, Float)] -> Gyroscope
[_gyro_temp] :: Gyroscope -> Float
[_gyro_vals] :: Gyroscope -> [(Float, Float, Float)]
gyro_temp :: Lens' Gyroscope Float
gyro_vals :: Lens' Gyroscope [(Float, Float, Float)]
data Face
Face :: Int -> Float -> Float -> Float -> Float -> Float -> Face
[_face_id] :: Face -> Int
[_face_x] :: Face -> Float
[_face_y] :: Face -> Float
[_face_w] :: Face -> Float
[_face_h] :: Face -> Float
[_face_smile] :: Face -> Float
face_id :: Lens' Face Int
face_x :: Lens' Face Float
face_y :: Lens' Face Float
face_w :: Lens' Face Float
face_h :: Lens' Face Float
face_smile :: Lens' Face Float
data GPSReading
GPSReading :: Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> Double -> UTCTime -> Double -> Int -> GPSReading
[_gpsr_lat] :: GPSReading -> Double
[_gpsr_lon] :: GPSReading -> Double
[_gpsr_alt] :: GPSReading -> Double
[_gpsr_speed2d] :: GPSReading -> Double
[_gpsr_speed3d] :: GPSReading -> Double
[_gpsr_time] :: GPSReading -> UTCTime
[_gpsr_dop] :: GPSReading -> Double
[_gpsr_fix] :: GPSReading -> Int
gpsr_lat :: Lens' GPSReading Double
gpsr_lon :: Lens' GPSReading Double
gpsr_alt :: Lens' GPSReading Double
gpsr_speed2d :: Lens' GPSReading Double
gpsr_speed3d :: Lens' GPSReading Double
gpsr_time :: Lens' GPSReading UTCTime
gpsr_dop :: Lens' GPSReading Double
gpsr_fix :: Lens' GPSReading Int
data AudioLevel
AudioLevel :: [Int] -> [Int] -> AudioLevel
[_audio_rms] :: AudioLevel -> [Int]
[_audio_peak] :: AudioLevel -> [Int]
audio_rms :: Lens' AudioLevel [Int]
audio_peak :: Lens' AudioLevel [Int]
data Location
Snow :: Location
Urban :: Location
Indoor :: Location
Water :: Location
Vegetation :: Location
Beach :: Location
_Snow :: Prism' Location ()
_Urban :: Prism' Location ()
_Indoor :: Prism' Location ()
_Water :: Prism' Location ()
_Vegetation :: Prism' Location ()
_Beach :: Prism' Location ()
data TVals
TVUnknown :: [Value] -> TVals
TVAccl :: Accelerometer -> TVals
TVGyro :: Gyroscope -> TVals
TVFaces :: [Face] -> TVals
TVGPS5 :: [GPSReading] -> TVals
TVGPS9 :: [GPSReading] -> TVals
TVAudioLevel :: AudioLevel -> TVals
TVScene :: [Map Location Float] -> TVals
_TVUnknown :: Prism' TVals [Value]
_TVAccl :: Prism' TVals Accelerometer
_TVGyro :: Prism' TVals Gyroscope
_TVFaces :: Prism' TVals [Face]
_TVGPS5 :: Prism' TVals [GPSReading]
_TVGPS9 :: Prism' TVals [GPSReading]
_TVAudioLevel :: Prism' TVals AudioLevel
_TVScene :: Prism' TVals [Map Location Float]
data Telemetry
Telemetry :: Word64 -> Int -> String -> TVals -> Telemetry
[_tele_stmp] :: Telemetry -> Word64
[_tele_tsmp] :: Telemetry -> Int
[_tele_name] :: Telemetry -> String
[_tele_values] :: Telemetry -> TVals
tele_stmp :: Lens' Telemetry Word64
tele_tsmp :: Lens' Telemetry Int
tele_name :: Lens' Telemetry String
tele_values :: Lens' Telemetry TVals
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.DEVC
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.Telemetry
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.TVals
instance GHC.Classes.Ord GoPro.DEVC.Location
instance GHC.Classes.Eq GoPro.DEVC.Location
instance GHC.Read.Read GoPro.DEVC.Location
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.Location
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.AudioLevel
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.GPSReading
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.Face
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.Gyroscope
instance GHC.Show.Show GoPro.DEVC.Accelerometer

module GoPro.Command.DEVCString
fourcc :: FourCC -> ByteString
cval :: Value -> ByteString
showValues :: Int -> [Value] -> ByteString
showTelemetry :: Int -> (FourCC, [Value]) -> ByteString
tshow :: Show a => a -> ByteString
joinMap :: Foldable f => (a -> ByteString) -> f a -> ByteString
showDEVC :: DEVC -> ByteString
showGPS :: GPSReading -> ByteString
